org.itsnat.comp.iframe

Interface ItsNatHTMLIFrame

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ItsNatComponent, ItsNatElementComponent, ItsNatHTMLElementComponent, ItsNatUserData

    public interface ItsNatHTMLIFrame
extends ItsNatHTMLElementComponent
    Is the interface of HTML <iframe> based components.

    This component alongside an <input type=file> element can be used for file uploading.

    When this component is disposed, any pending file upload process is disposed and not executed.

    ItsNat provides a default implementation of this interface.

    Author:
    Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria
    See Also:
    ItsNatHTMLComponentManager.createItsNatHTMLIFrame(org.w3c.dom.html.HTMLIFrameElement,org.itsnat.core.NameValue[])

    • Method Detail

      • getHTMLIFrameElement

        org.w3c.dom.html.HTMLIFrameElement getHTMLIFrameElement()
        Returns the associated DOM element to this component.
        Returns:
        the associated DOM element.

      • getHTMLIFrameFileUpload

        HTMLIFrameFileUpload getHTMLIFrameFileUpload(ClientDocument clientDoc,
                                           org.w3c.dom.html.HTMLInputElement elem)
        Creates a file upload task associated to this iframe component and to the specified <input type=file> element.
        Parameters:
        elem - the input file element, cannot be null.
        clientDoc - the client to send the file upload request.
        Returns:
        a file upload task instance to initiate and process the file upload request.

      • getHTMLIFrameFileUpload

        HTMLIFrameFileUpload getHTMLIFrameFileUpload(org.w3c.dom.html.HTMLInputElement elem)
        Creates a file upload task associated to this iframe component and to the specified <input type=file> element.

        The ClientDocument to send the file upload request is the client associated to the current web request or, if this call is not executed into a web request, the client which loaded the document (the first client).

        Parameters:
        elem - the input file element, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        a file upload task instance to initiate and process the file upload request.
        See Also:
        getHTMLIFrameFileUpload(ClientDocument,HTMLInputElement)
